title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 3, pt. 137 - Nonresident Partners
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 3, pt. 137 - Nonresident Partners

State Regulations
§ 137.1 - Partnership income and deductions of nonresident partner derived from New York State sources
§ 137.2 - Special rules as to New York State sources
§ 137.3 - Modification of partnership items in partner's New York State nonresident personal income tax return
§ 137.4 - Alternate methods
§ 137.5 - Application of rules for resident partners to nonresident partners
§ 137.6 - Tiered partnerships
§ 137.7 - Cross-references

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 3, pt. 137

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§171, 632, 697, 1096

This Part does not reflect amendments to the Tax Law made
by the Tax Reform and Reduction Act of 1987 (Chapter 28 of the Laws of 1987)
and certain other amendments. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
